item.title: I Canâ€™t Get Over Namor Joining Avengers: Doomsday
item.description: I'm excited to see that Namor will finally be returning to the MCU in Avengers: Doomsday, but his return could herald a particularly fraught dynamic.

item.title: Robert De Niro Didn't Need To Play Both Lead Roles In The Alto Knights & These 5 Actors Would've Been Great Co-Stars
item.description: Robert De Niro plays both lead roles in Barry Levinson's The Alto Knights, but a different actor should have taken one of the roles instead.

item.title: What THAT Lucy Gray Reference In Sunrise On The Reaping Means For Her Hunger Games Fate
item.description: Sunrise on the Reaping included a meaningful reference to Lucy Gray Baird that carefully adds to the mystery and tragedy of her Hunger Games fate.
